duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify new opportunities and accounts, create and propose client solutions, and close new business to meet sales quotas.
Build a pipeline of sales opportunities through systematic prospecting and networking.
Develop effective marketing and sales strategies for the achievement of goals.
Manage and grow client relationships and enhance the overall client experience.
Regularly report on performance metrics, market trends, and sales forecasts to the CEO and global management team.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field (MBA preferred)
